issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.summary: System Components Page is not available

comments.body:
GitHub user kishorvpatil opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799

    [STORM-1110] Fix Component Page for system components

    - Remove redundant method `system-id?` - as is calls into static `Utils/isSystemId`
    - All System components are of type bolts.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1110

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #799
    
----
commit 8281115371e852eb540246fd127b29d1da5e6f6a
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2015-10-14T18:45:20Z

    Remove redundent clojure method system-id

commit 88bfa5af12ec07c0fb4c2d4a66f1812fee004edf
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2015-10-14T18:46:32Z

    The system components are of type bolts

----

Github user knusbaum commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-148177465
  
    +1

Github user d2r commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-148178178
  
    +1 pending no relevant build issues.

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-148178374
  
    +1 pending build

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-148182253
  
    The failures look unrelated.  We got failures in nimbus-auth-test, but nothing showed up in the logs, so I am not really sure how/why they failed.

Github user knusbaum commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-148193041
  
    Tests pass on my machine.

Github user kishorvpatil commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-149356704
  
    testing travis build..

Github user kishorvpatil closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799

GitHub user kishorvpatil reopened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799

    [STORM-1110] Fix Component Page for system components

    - Remove redundant method `system-id?` - as is calls into static `Utils/isSystemId`
    - All System components are of type bolts.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1110

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #799
    
----

    Remove redundent clojure method system-id

commit 88bfa5af12ec07c0fb4c2d4a66f1812fee004edf
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>

    The system components are of type bolts

Github user HeartSaVioR commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/799#issuecomment-149365765
  
    Since there're so many random test failures for now, we may be OK to treat test is passed when more than one of two Travis build are success.

Github user HeartSaVioR commented on the pull request:
